Room.Name: Avatar Boulevard/Lelion Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Lelion Way and Avatar Boulevard.
Room.LongDescription: Avatar Boulevard, running north and south, intersects Lelion Way, which runs east and west, through the intersection. On the southeast, you can see a large facility for the numerous wounded people of Oceancrest. Many if not all of the people entering the facility are being carried in on stretchers, bleeding profusely.
